name: RytmSkip
description:
A rhythm game where you create what you want and can compete with what you are.

A rhythm based game where you click buttons on your keyboard in sync with the music.

Controls: W, A, S, D

W: UP

A: LEFT

S: DOWN

D: RIGHT

NOTE: this game is in very early development.

This game is made and developed by Bietlxn

bietlxn (C) rhythm

version: 0.0.6
